00017 // EARS
00018 #include "QueryRep.hpp"
00019 #include "Logger.hpp"
00020 
00021 // Lemur
00022 #include "BasicDocStream.hpp"
00023 #include "Param.hpp"
00024 #include "TextQuery.hpp"
00025 
00027 #define UNKNOWN_QUERY "[UNKNOWN_QUERY]"
00028 
00029 
00031 void 
00032 ears::QueryRep::loadQueries( const lemur::api::Index& index )
00033 {
00034   //
00035   // parameters
00036   //
00037   std::string queryFile = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "queryFile" );
00038   if ( queryFile.length() == 0 ) {
00039     LOG( logERROR ) << "Parameter 'queryFile' is not set";
00040     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00041   }
00042   
00043   //
00044   // loading queries from file
00045   //
00046   double weight;
00047   double sumWeight;
00048   lemur::api::TERM_T term;
00049   lemur::api::TERMID_T termID;
00050   EXID_T queryID;
00051   
00052   LOG( logINFO ) << "Loading queries '" << queryFile << "'";
00053   
00054   try {
00055     // use Lemur's docStream object to parse queries
00056     lemur::api::DocStream* qryStream = new lemur::parse::BasicDocStream( queryFile );
00057     qryStream->startDocIteration();
00058     
00059     while ( qryStream->hasMore() ) {      
00060       lemur::api::Document* d = qryStream->nextDoc();
00061       queryID = d->getID();      
00062       LOG( logDEBUG ) << "Query '" << queryID << "':";
00063       
00064       // query terms
00065       DISTR_T queryTerms;
00066       sumWeight = 0.0;
00067       lemur::api::TextQuery* q = new lemur::api::TextQuery( *d );      
00068       
00069       LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Data read from query file:";
00070       
00071       q->startTermIteration();
00072       while ( q->hasMore() ) {  
00073         const lemur::api::Term* t = q->nextTerm();
00074         std::string line = t->spelling();
00075         int pos = line.find(";");
00076                 
00077         // query format 1: "term;weight\n"
00078         if ( pos != string::npos) {          
00079                                         term = line.substr( 0, pos );
00080                                         char *pEnd;
00081                                         weight = strtod( line.substr( pos+1, line.length() ).c_str(), &pEnd );          
00082         }
00083         // query format 0: "term\n"
00084         else {
00085           term = line;
00086           weight = 1.0;
00087         }
00088         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "  TERM: '" << term << "'   WEIGHT: " << weight;
00089         
00090         termID = index.term( term );
00091         if ( termID > 0 ) {
00092           queryTerms[termID] = weight; 
00093           sumWeight += weight;
00094         }
00095         else {
00096           LOG( logWARNING ) << "Term '" << term << "' does not exist in index"
00097           << " (query term ignored)";          
00098         }
00099       }
00100       
00101       if ( sumWeight > 0.0 ) {              
00102         // normalizing term distribution
00103         DISTR_T queryDistr;
00104         DISTR_T::const_iterator it;
00105         
00106         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Internal query representation:";
00107         
00108         for ( it = queryTerms.begin(); it != queryTerms.end(); it++ ) {
00109           weight = (double) it->second / sumWeight;
00110           queryDistr[it->first] = weight;
00111           
00112           LOG( logDEBUG ) << "    TERM: '" << index.term( it->first ) << "'"
00113           << " (ID " << it->first << ")   WEIGHT: " << weight;
00114         }      
00115         
00116         // recording query
00117         queryID_.push_back( queryID );                  
00118         ptq_.push_back( queryDistr );
00119       }
00120       else {
00121         LOG( logWARNING ) << "Query '" << queryID << "' is empty; ignored";
00122       }
00123       
00124       delete q;
00125     }
00126     
00127     delete qryStream;
00128   } 
00129   catch ( const lemur::api::Exception& e ) {
00130     LOG( logERROR ) << "Can't open query file, check parameter queryFile";
00131     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );
00132   } 
00133   
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00137 
00139 const int 
00140 ears::QueryRep::queryNum() const
00141 {
00142   return queryID_.size();
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 
00148 const ears::EXID_T 
00149 ears::QueryRep::queryID( const int& qID ) const
00150 {
00151   if ( qID >= 0 && qID < queryID_.size() )
00152     return queryID_[qID];
00153   else
00154     return UNKNOWN_QUERY;
00155 }
00156 
00157 
00158 
00160 const ears::DISTR_T 
00161 ears::QueryRep::query( const int& qID ) const
00162 {
00163   if ( qID >= 0 && qID < ptq_.size() ) 
00164     return ptq_[qID];
00165   else {
00166     LOG( logERROR ) << "Reference to non-existing query";
00167     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );        
00168   }  
00169 }
00170 
00171 
00172 
00174 lemur::retrieval::SimpleKLQueryModel* 
00175 ears::QueryRep::query( const lemur::api::Index& index, const int& qID ) const
00176 {
00177   lemur::retrieval::SimpleKLQueryModel* qModel 
00178   = new lemur::retrieval::SimpleKLQueryModel( index );
00179   
00180   const DISTR_T& q = this->query( qID );
00181   for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator term_it = q.begin();
00182        term_it != q.end(); term_it++ ) {    
00183     const lemur::api::TERMID_T& termID = term_it->first; // t
00184     const double& ptq = term_it->second; // p(t|q)    
00185     qModel->setCount( termID, ptq );
00186   }
00187 
00188   return qModel;
00189 }
